text: New Sweden (, ) was a Swedish colony in North America that existed from 1638 through 1655. It was in what are now the US states of Delaware, New Jersey, and Pennsylvania. Its capital was Fort Christina, now in Wilmington. New Sweden was captured by the Dutch in 1655 and incorporated into New Netherland. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1638 establishments in North America Category:History of Delaware Category:History of Sweden Category:History of New Jersey Category:History of Pennsylvania Category:1650s disestablishments Category:Former colonies in North America
title: New Sweden
